'''0.1.0''' is the first release for the {{el|ds}} which came out on September 13–14, 2017.<ref name="mcnet">{{Mcnet|minecraft-new-3ds|Minecraft on new 3DS!|September 13, 2017}}</ref>

== Features ==
All features from and prior to [[Pocket Edition v0.15.4 alpha]], except that [[map]] items are replaced with a permanent map on the touch screen. There is also a nether panorama on the bottom screen.

== Trivia ==
* 0.1.0 is the only ''New Nintendo 3DS Edition'' version to be prefixed with the number 0.
